solution_line_template: There are {initial_boys} boys - {boys_drop_out} boys = <<{initial_boys}-{boys_drop_out}={boys_left}>>{boys_left} boys left.
There are {initial_girls} girls - {girls_drop_out} girls = <<{initial_girls}-{girls_drop_out}={girls_left}>>{girls_left} girls left.
In total there are {boys_left} boys + {girls_left} girls = <<{boys_left}+{girls_left}={total_left}>>{total_left} boys and girls left.
